metadata.title: USN-6826-1 -- mod_jk vulnerability
metadata.description: Karl von Randow discovered that mod_jk was vulnerable to an authentication bypass. If the configuration did not provide explicit mounts for all possible proxied requests, an attacker could possibly use this  vulnerability to bypass security constraints configured in httpd.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6826-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapache-mod-jk-doc - 1:1.2.43-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libapache2-mod-jk - 1:1.2.43-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
